title: Fragment, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound fancy satin with supplementary weft
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 10 x 10.8 cm (3 15/16 x 4 1/4 in.)
description: Incomplete upper section of rearing winged crested dragon clutching at a lance pressed into its side by a fragmentary hand. Tiny pavilion with flowers rising from it in the background. In white outlined with pale green on a golden yellow ground. Details in yellow, dark red and pale blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, early 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: compound fancy satin with supplementary weft. 1953-162-20.
